name: 3dcreator
description: 3D Creator is a prototype that shows how students (grades 7-12) can use block-based programming to create immersive 3D scenes.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && rm -rf ./.parcel-cache && npx parcel build --public-url '.' index.html
scripts.server: npm run build && npx parcel serve index.html -p 55000

author: Simon Guest
